title: Consumer spending on clothing in France 2008 to 2017
yAxis: Final consumption expenditure in million euros
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Final consumption expenditure in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
Overall Final consumption expenditure in million euros has decreased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Final consumption expenditure in million euros, of value 37494.0 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Final consumption expenditure in million euros about 35574.0 was reached at Year 2011, and 2013
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Final consumption expenditure in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Final consumption expenditure in million euros has stayed the same over the Year.

Final consumption expenditure in million euros is gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
